name: PostAway
body:
### Welcome to PostAway.
This is a little posting page that uses PHP and MySQL. Earlier this was powered by [Firebase][1], but MySQL databases are better for many reasons:

- Queries are syntactically easy to understand.

```
//MySQL
mysql_query("SELECT * FROM messages");
```
-
-

[1]: http://www.firebase.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
